title: If your game is freezing at ~5-10 minutes, look here
body:
Hey all, we recently began to address an issue where players had there game freezing 5-10 minutes into the game as seen on [this](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/1yUAdeKV-in-game-freezing?comment=004500000002) thread.  We addressed the main source of this issue, but there are still some edge cases that could result in this problem occurring even after our initial fix.  

If you are still encountering this problem, following these steps will really help us out in tracking down the root cause.

1.  When the issue occurs(IMPORTANT THAT IT IS WHEN IT OCCURS), open up task manager (ctrl + alt + del, and then select task manager)
2.  Right click the process that says ‘League of Legends (TM) Client’ and click ‘Create dump file’.  This will take a few moments.
3.  Copy the link and navigate to the folder.  For me it looks like this: 
	C:\Users\acohen\AppData\Local\Temp\League of Legends.DMP
	I would want to go to C:\Users\acohen\AppData\Local\Temp\ in windows explorer

4.  Go to https://www.filemail.com/ select ‘Send as link’ (next to send as email towards the middle), and click the Add Files button.  Navigate to the DMP file from above, and then click ‘Send’.  You will be prompted with another window, where you click ‘Send’ again.  (This will take a little while).
5.  You will be provided with a link, which will lead us to the file you just uploaded.  Copy/paste that link in this thread.


I'll be paying attention to this thread and updating it as we better understand the problem.  Sorry for the inconvenience and thank you for bearing with us.

replies.body:
Hi, I'm having this issue but I'm unable to get to my task manager to create a dump file because when it freezes, I can't alt tab out completely. My taskbar shows up but league stays on top of everything else and doesn't minimise. About 5 times in the last 3/4 days it's frozen a few minutes into the game, nearly always right after the first wave of minions meet. 
At the moment my only fix is signing out, signing back in and reconnecting, but at that point I'm usually 6 levels and 60 cs down, it's getting really frustrating. 
I ran full repair in the client and it doesn't seem to have helped.
Same here and it's  very frustrating :(

Hi, I've been having this issue for the last 3 weeks, I lose control every single game between 6-10 min. and have to quit/reconnect to fix the issue.
Here's my dmp:  [file](https://fil.email/w2oJ7auM)
Thanks
Great job "monitoring" this thread guys. The bug is still happening for me, please do something.
I am having the same problem also cant bring up task manager when it happens so cant get the file. Not sure what to do. If support could please help.
I just recently started having this same issue, is there a fix yet?
When my game freezes I can't click anything at all I have to hard restart my pc  and when I get back in game I  the team remakes and I had have leaver buster because of this reason.

Hello Riot Afic, it is I. So when the servers came back I decided to play a few games and the problem was still there. Of course like a strange sickness, it started off with just very small stutters in the first game up to the point where everything I tried to do had a delay to it in the last one where I got the DMP file for ya.

I hope it can help figure out what the issue could be, for everyone suffering something of the sorts.

https://fil.email/xwSnY1ow
cool, thanks for this!  Going to forward it to an engineer and get back to you once I know more

So it looks like the problem isn't related to the same issue as the freeze from yesterday.  I did notice you have quite a few things running with league (DiscordHook - overlay from Discord injected into the game, Razer Cortex - FPS monitor/tracker from Razer injected into the game, AVG anti-virus library), so it might be worth disabling them 1 at a time to see if that improves the problem.

So I sort of face palmed at the idea of my Discord Overlay causing the issue since I've had it on for so long at this point. When I turned it off, the next game I was in I didn't run into the issue until the end (Was a short twenty odd or so minute game.) I closed my Razer Cortex fully (Which is supposed to help not cause problems ironically) and played another and saw none of my issues pop up. The only thing I didn't disable was my AVG, but mainly because I already have League whitelisted because of a prior problem way back so I don't see AVG causing too big of a fuss.

Totally fixed? I can't say for certain with just two games with those changes but to be frank if in the long run the problem becomes less frequent then it can be then I'm pleased.

Still can't thank you enough for all the help and attention to this problem!

No problem!  Glad it is resolved and you can get back to playing league without fps related issues =)  

Feel free to reach out to me if you run into any future issues.  Happy to help figure out what is going wrong
No problem~! And thank you for being on this!{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
woops, just responded to myself instead of responding to your post.  pinging this so you see my other response

Hi Riot.

https://fil.email/gvOgmE00

(During the game, at around 8 minute, I experience a weird kind of crash problem.
Every key in my keyboard lags.
For example I press Q the indicator appears (e.g. ekko's Q) but the ability will take same time to fire (2-5 sec)
When I press Tab the window appears but it will last so long (even when I am not pressing it anymore), covering the map. So I don't see anything for a while.
When I press B, it takes some time to recall too (like 2 seconds).
When I use the arrows to navigate it takes time too. So I only use the mouse.
Even when I am typing a message in chat, it will start to appear after a long time, and it will appear too slow, (like 1 letter per second).
So the only thing I can do during this time, is moving arround with the mouse and farm with auto attacks, cause doing something else like casting an ability or a spell, will probably get me killed due to the time it requires.
This happens approximately at 8 minute (or sooner) and it lasts approximately 5 minutes, and then everything works fine.
I have been experiencing this problem the last 2 months. Before everything worked fine
I hope you read this.
I will much appreciate it if you could somehow help me.)

Hello everyone,

Like a lot of you I've been having this issue as well BUT I have stumbled across a simple fix, I open the folder for League of Legends then open the subfolder config then delete the game.cfg file before every match. Simple enough just leave the folder open and re-delete the .cfg file before each session =) For the moment it works for me.. Thought I'd share in hopes it may help others =)

Hello, I've recently bought a new computer and have been getting this sort of situation. My game freezes after 12 minutes into the game, takes about 5 minutes or more to get out of the freeze and will continue to freeze every 30 seconds, if I close the client and reconnect, the freeze will happen after another 12 minutes into the game and repeat itself. I unfortunately cannot get back to the my desktop nor does Task Manager pop up over league and alt tabbing doesn't minimize it,so I have no way of making the dump file as the freeze occurs. The only way out of it is either wait out the freeze or sign out of my computer then sign back in.

had the issue for awhile now talked to riot support twice and nothing seems to work. the game crashed on me again last night. at least it wasn't ranked but still frustrating.  i have done a clean install of both my graphics drivers and reinstalled the game and it doesn't fix anything.. here is my most recent ticket number that is still currently open #34975208
how long is a while?  Sounds like the issue you are having is completely different.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Afic,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=P3Zuk4JU,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2018-06-05T18:20:51.888+0000)
>
> how long is a while?  Sounds like the issue you are having is completely different.

since the new patch came out. the support dude i talked to said a lot of people were having the issue. i have to force close the client and restart it after the game freezes.  heres my first ticket number too. #34942136 and #34942913

when you say the game 'crashed' on you do you mean that you got a bug splat or something else?  If your game is freezing, if you could follow the steps outlined [here](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/P3Zuk4JU-if-your-game-is-freezing-at-5-10-minutes-look-here) that would help us track down the issue.

I've been having this same issue for around 2 months now and when I sent the support a ticket they told me to use a low config file they sent me of the game even though I'm pretty sure its not my pc, its just this issue occurs only in leauge at 8-11 minute mark everything freezes for around 5-10 seconds my screen goes black. fps drop to 2-0 and I can't press anything...I can't get that file asked for either when the issue occurs 
Can someone update us?
We can't do it now because of the maintenance, but I will post the link after I can login to the game.

I have same issue. It ranges from minute 5-15 its usually minute 8 or 11. but depends sometimes happens on 6 and once at minute 15. it always freezes for 15 seconds give or take. Even tried to do clean instal of League. Nothing changed.
https://fil.email/Qg8cIfDg
same problem..did you solve the problem?

Hello,

**There is some solution:**

I don't know why, but this worked for me, I found it on some other forums.

In game go to OPTIONS/VIDEO, there is **Windowed mode**. Set **Borderless**
or go to **C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config** open **game.cfg** find **WindowMode** and change it to **WindowMode=2**

I've tried many solutions, but only this definitley works for me (random FPS drops from 120 to 0 at ~5-10 minute mark of each game)

I normally don't write on forums like this, but this problem was so annoying... I hope it will help some other players.

i found solution. just go to league of legends game client, press settings in right conrer (left from close button X) in the general tab check the "close client during the game". the client will be turned off while u play and after the game it will turn on. it worked for me and now i dont have lag and fps drop during the game!

> [{quoted}](name=ZuuZi,realm=EUW,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=P3Zuk4JU,comment-id=0023,timestamp=2019-03-27T22:37:25.104+0000)
>

If this works I owe u big time bro

i found solution. just go to league of legends game client, press settings in right conrer (left from close button X) in the general tab check the "close client during the game". the client will be turned off while u play and after the game it will turn on. it worked for me and now i dont have lag and fps drop during the game!

How the fuck is this still happening? When the fuck is riot going to fucking fix this shit?

Seemingly at random, once every few games (sometimes twice a game, but rarely), screen freezes with Windows error beep sound; application is not responding in task manager. Alt-Tab works, but not visually; the in-game frozen screen stays on top.
Temporary solution to get back in game faster: set task manager to always stay on top (in options) so that you can terminate the process and reconnect ASAP.

Alienware 17: Windows 10 Home 64bit; IntelCore i7-4700MQ 2.40GHz; 16GB RAM.
